sections.heading: official, defined.The term county official shall include any county officer or employee of a county officer who is charged with the duty of valuing, assessing, or equalizing property for property tax purposes

sections.text:
77-116.County official, defined.

The term county official shall include any county officer or employee of a county officer who is charged with the duty of valuing, assessing, or equalizing property for property tax purposes.

SourceLaws 1987, LB 508, ยง 3.
